post.description: Create a new on-demand reservation for a parking spot. On-demand reservations have a start time but no end time.

422.description: Validation error or parking spot not available

post.description: Create a new scheduled reservation for a parking spot with specific start and end times. Scheduled reservations must have both start and end times.

422.description: Validation error, invalid time range, or parking spot not available

get.summary: Get a list of all facilities
Get a specific facility by ID
Get a list of all parking spots
get.description: Display a listing of parking spots.

post.description: Store a newly created parking spot.

items.example: The spot number is already taken for this facility.

get.summary: Get a specific parking spot by ID

items.example: The selected facility id is invalid.

message.example: Verification PIN has been sent to your email.

post.summary: Verify OTP and get access token

user_id.description: User ID who made the reservation

parking_spot_id.description: Parking spot ID that was reserved

end_time.description: Reservation end time (null for on-demand reservations)

updated_at.description: When the reservation was last updated

parking_spot_id.description: ID of the parking spot to reserve
